p: HSV-1 glycoproteins including gB, gD, gH and gL are required for HSV-1 entry and cell fusion [ 10, 11]. ICP6 is a HSV-1 ribonucleotide large subunit that is critical for the synthesis of deoxyribonucleotide [ 29]. We then investigated whether MD suppressed the expression levels of HSV-1 proteins. In this study, the results of western blot analysis showed that the expression levels of gB and ICP6 were significantly suppressed in a dose-dependent manner in both the mouse cell line (Fig.Â 2a and b) and the human cell line (Fig. 2c and d).
